title: Floods, landslides wreak havoc in Assam, over 6 lakh affected | In photos - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Floods, landslides wreak havoc in Assam, over 6 lakh affected | In photos  Hindustan Times
  2. Assam Floods News: New Haflong Station Submerged, Over 4 Lakh People Affected Due To Heavy Rains  India Today
  3. Food Stocks Running Out, Hundreds Await Rescue In Flood-Hit Assam Villages  NDTV
  4. Death Toll Rises to 9 As Assam Floods Claim Another Life; Army, NDRF, Assam Rifles Mobilised To Provide Aid | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com  The Weather Channel
  5. Fact Check: Neither Assam nor Australia, this shocking 2021 video shows an old Indonesian bridge getting destroyed during floods  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Assam floods: Incessant rainfall and landslides over the past few days have thrown life out of gear in several parts of the state. Communication lines have also been cut in some places. The authorities said more than 6.62 lakh people in 27 districts were affected by the current spell of floods.
